Title: The Tombs
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Mark Stegemann
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: As Jesse helps re-invigorate business at Angelville, Tulip and Cassidy's faith in him is tested when Angelville brings out a side of him that they've never seen before.
